question_text: Which of the following is true about container behavior by default?
answer_options: Containers are aware of each other and share memory automatically
Containers communicate through a shared file system
Containers are isolated and unaware of others unless explicitly connected
Containers always share the same application binary
correct_answer: Containers are isolated and unaware of others unless explicitly connected
explanation: Containers are self-contained and do not interact unless the container engine is configured to allow it.
